publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1207 Ian McKee: Loanhead Community Learning Centre—That the Parliament congratulates Loanhead Community Learning Centre (LCLC), Midlothian, on winning the International Play Association’s Right to Play Award 2008 at an awards ceremony in Hong Kong; applauds the hard work done by staff and volunteers in providing educational, social welfare and recreational opportunities for over 1,000 people who use the centre every week; notes the success of the LCLC in providing the focal point to bring people together from new housing schemes, and wishes it every success in continuing to provide this service well into the future.
